text.#text:
The purpose of this Act is to apply
			 employment benefits and obligations to Federal employees in same-sex domestic
			 partnerships and to their domestic partners that are the same as the employment
			 benefits and obligations that apply under existing statutes to married Federal
			 employees and to their spouses.
